confirmReservation.title: confirmReservation
confirmReservation.description: If customer confirm about the reservation then pass the 'ConfirmReservation' as 'Confirm'.

floorType.title: floorType
floorType.description: If customer interested for Floor Preference then pass the 'FloorType' as 'Top Floor'.

reservationId.title: reservationId
reservationId.description: To update the Reservation always reservationId required.

roomType.title: roomType
roomType.description: If customer interested for Room Upgrade then pass the pass the 'RoomType' as 'Deluxe'.

upsellType.title: upsellType
upsellType.description: If customer interested for upsell to a Ocean view room then pass the 'UpsellType' as 'Ocean/Sea View Room'.
